HTMLFieldSetElementValidationMessage.summary: The validationMessage read-only property of the interface returns a string representing a localized message that describes the validation constraints that the {{htmlelement("fieldset")}} control does not satisfy (if any). This is the empty string as <fieldset> elements are not candidates for constraint validation ( is false).

remarks.para:
-fieldset

-Learn: Client-side form validation
-Guide: Constraint validation
-CSS :valid and :invalid pseudo-classes
